channel.title: WowScape by Bumper Ltd
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i39.tinypic.com/sb0l6v.gif[/img] [size=18pt]By[/size] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2m3i437.jpg[/img][/center]
Welcome to The WowScape Development Team Thread, Firstly i will give you a background of the server, then i will supply some features and then end with the the Positions needed and the Application form.
[b]Background;[/b] I first thought of the idea when i created my first server website, i thought to myself, Why don't i combine 2 things i enjoy and make 1 thing that everyone will enjoy. Now i am confident with my HTML, CSS and PHP knowledge i am going to combine it all with Java and make a server with it all, I am in the process of making a website like [url=http://www.jagex.com]Jagex[/url] to use as they do, recruiting staff, advertising the game and other things we do.
[hr]
[b]Features; [/b] Below you will find all the features we will have. [center]Key: Green = Completed | Orange = In progress | Red = Not started [/center][b]Bumper Ltd. Main Site - Completed - Link = *
[ul][li]Home Page - 100% Completed[/li] [li]Job's Available - 100% Completed[/li] [li]Contact page - 100% Completed[/li] [li]Parents' Guide - 100% Completed[/li] [li]FAQ - 100% Completed[/li][/ul]
[b]WowScape Main Site[/b]
[ul][li]Home Page - 60% Completed[/li] [li]Staff List - 0% Completed[/li] [li]Account Page - 0% Completed[/li] [list] [li]Appeal Ban/Mute - 0% Completed[/li] [li]Password Recovery - 0% Completed[/li] [li]Read Messages from Bumper. - 0% Completed[/li] [li]Upgrade to members - 0% Completed[/li] [/list][/ul]
[ul][li]Help Page - 0% Completed[/li] [list] [li]Customer Support - 0% Completed[/li] [li]Report a Bug - 0% Completed[/li] [li]Parents' Guide - 0% Completed[/li] [/list][/ul]
[b]WowScape Server[/b] Progress - 0% Completed The Server hasn't been started so no features as of yet.
[hr]
[b]Positions Needed:[/b]
[ul][li]WowScape Server Developers x3[/li] [li]WowScape Client Developers x2[/li] [li]Graphics Designers x2[/li] [li]Website Developers x2[/li][/ul]
[b]Job Descriptions;[/b] [hr] [b]WowScape Server Developers[/b] we are looking for Three outstanding Developers to work on our Adventure game 'WowScape'.
Working with our development team means you must be creative and good with people skills, Afterall, We don't want our developers falling out with each other as that would cause development to stumble and we need 'WowScape' to be the best we can make it!
You will be expected to work on 'WowScape' atleast 4 days a week and be able to provide excellent team contributions.
[b]Essential Requirements;[/b]
[ul][li]You must Know The 'Java' programming and know how it is used in the private Server[/li] [li]You must work well in a team[/li] [li]Be open to constructive critisism[/li] [li]You must agree to the Terms and Conditions at the bottom of the job descriptions[/li][/ul]
[hr] [b]WowScape Client Developers[/b] we are looking for Two outstanding Developers to work on our Adventure game 'WowScape''s Client.
Working with our development team means you must be creative and good with people skills, Afterall, We don't want our developers falling out with each other as that would cause development to stumble and we need 'WowScape' to be the best we can make it!
You will be expected to work on The Client atleast 3 days a week and be able to provide excellent team contributions.
[b]Essential Requirements;[/b]
[ul][li]You must Know The 'Java' programming and know how it is used in the client[/li] [li]You must work well in a team[/li] [li]Be open to constructive critisism[/li] [li]You must agree to the Terms and Conditions at the bottom of the job descriptions[/li][/ul]
[hr] [b]Graphics Designers[/b] we are looking for Two outstanding graphic Artists to work on WowScape's Graphics
Working with our development team means you must be creative and good with people skills, Afterall, We don't want our developers falling out with each other as that would cause development to stumble and we need 'WowScape' to be the best we can make it!
[b]Essential Requirements;[/b]
[ul][li]You must have either PhotoShop, or other high quality graphic software[/li] [li]You must work well in a team[/li] [li]Be open to constructive critisism[/li] [li]You must agree to the Terms and Conditions at the bottom of the job descriptions[/li][/ul]
[hr] [b]Website Developers[/b] we are looking for Two outstanding Website Developers to help me with the websites.
Working with our development team means you must be creative and good with people skills, Afterall, We don't want our developers falling out with each other as that would cause development to stumble and we need 'WowScape' to be the best we can make it!
You will be expected to work atleast 3 days a week and be able to provide excellent team contributions.
[b]Essential Requirements;[/b]
[ul][li]You must Know HTML and CSS and Possibly PHP[/li] [li]You must work well in a team[/li] [li]Be open to constructive critisism[/li] [li]You must agree to the Terms and Conditions at the bottom of the job descriptions[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[b]Terms & Conditions[/b]
[b]Loyalty;[/b] You agree that you will not tell anyone other than Bumper ltd. Team members of yours plans for the server or tell anyone other Bumper Ltd. Team about any of the other un-released content.
[b]Personal Information;[/b] You will not share any personal information of the Bumper Ltd. team or its members with anyone. All information must be kept personal.
[hr] [code][center][b]Application Form[/b] Name: Applying for: Email: Age: Experience: Proof of experience: (link) Do you agree to Terms & Conditions?: Yes/No[/center][/code]

item.title: WowScape by Bumper Ltd
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

That’s a good attempt for a pseudo-professional server. If you would like to establish a real organization of a server, purchase a domain. Secondly, how are your Bumper organization and Wowscape server copyrights? You need to register for copyright trademarks. Otherwise, I love the design of the site, and good luck with this project.

Read full topic

item.title: WowScape by Bumper Ltd
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[center] [size=18pt]By[/size] [/center]

Welcome to The WowScape Development Team Thread, Firstly i will give you a background of the server, then i will supply some features and then end with the the Positions needed and the Application form.

Background; I first thought of the idea when i created my first server website, i thought to myself, Why don’t i combine 2 things i enjoy and make 1 thing that everyone will enjoy. Now i am confident with my HTML, CSS and PHP knowledge i am going to combine it all with Java and make a server with it all, I am in the process of making a website like Jagex to use as they do, recruiting staff, advertising the game and other things we do.

[hr]

Features; Below you will find all the features we will have.
[center]Key:
Green = Completed | Orange = In progress | Red = Not started
[/center][b]Bumper Ltd. Main Site - Completed - Link = *

[ul][li]Home Page - 100% Completed[/li]
[li]Job’s Available - 100% Completed[/li]
[li]Contact page - 100% Completed[/li]
[li]Parents’ Guide - 100% Completed[/li]
[li]FAQ - 100% Completed[/li][/ul]

WowScape Main Site

[ul][li]Home Page - 60% Completed[/li]
[li]Staff List - 0% Completed[/li]
[li]Account Page - 0% Completed[/li]
[list]
[li]Appeal Ban/Mute - 0% Completed[/li]
[li]Password Recovery - 0% Completed[/li]
[li]Read Messages from Bumper. - 0% Completed[/li]
[li]Upgrade to members - 0% Completed[/li]
[/list][/ul]

[ul][li]Help Page - 0% Completed[/li]
[list]
[li]Customer Support - 0% Completed[/li]
[li]Report a Bug - 0% Completed[/li]
[li]Parents’ Guide - 0% Completed[/li]
[/list][/ul]

WowScape Server
Progress - 0% Completed
The Server hasn’t been started so no features as of yet.

[hr]

Positions Needed:

[ul][li]WowScape Server Developers x3[/li]
[li]WowScape Client Developers x2[/li]
[li]Graphics Designers x2[/li]
[li]Website Developers x2[/li][/ul]

Job Descriptions;
[hr]
WowScape Server Developers
we are looking for Three outstanding Developers to work on our Adventure game ‘WowScape’.

Working with our development team means you must be creative and good with people skills, Afterall, We don’t want our developers falling out with each other as that would cause development to stumble and we need ‘WowScape’ to be the best we can make it!

You will be expected to work on ‘WowScape’ atleast 4 days a week and be able to provide excellent team contributions.

Essential Requirements;

[ul][li]You must Know The ‘Java’ programming and know how it is used in the private Server[/li]
[li]You must work well in a team[/li]
[li]Be open to constructive critisism[/li]
[li]You must agree to the Terms and Conditions at the bottom of the job descriptions[/li][/ul]

[hr]
WowScape Client Developers
we are looking for Two outstanding Developers to work on our Adventure game ‘WowScape’'s Client.

Working with our development team means you must be creative and good with people skills, Afterall, We don’t want our developers falling out with each other as that would cause development to stumble and we need ‘WowScape’ to be the best we can make it!

You will be expected to work on The Client atleast 3 days a week and be able to provide excellent team contributions.

Essential Requirements;

[ul][li]You must Know The ‘Java’ programming and know how it is used in the client[/li]
[li]You must work well in a team[/li]
[li]Be open to constructive critisism[/li]
[li]You must agree to the Terms and Conditions at the bottom of the job descriptions[/li][/ul]

[hr]
Graphics Designers
we are looking for Two outstanding graphic Artists to work on WowScape’s Graphics

Working with our development team means you must be creative and good with people skills, Afterall, We don’t want our developers falling out with each other as that would cause development to stumble and we need ‘WowScape’ to be the best we can make it!

Essential Requirements;

[ul][li]You must have either PhotoShop, or other high quality graphic software[/li]
[li]You must work well in a team[/li]
[li]Be open to constructive critisism[/li]
[li]You must agree to the Terms and Conditions at the bottom of the job descriptions[/li][/ul]

[hr]
Website Developers
we are looking for Two outstanding Website Developers to help me with the websites.

Working with our development team means you must be creative and good with people skills, Afterall, We don’t want our developers falling out with each other as that would cause development to stumble and we need ‘WowScape’ to be the best we can make it!

You will be expected to work atleast 3 days a week and be able to provide excellent team contributions.

Essential Requirements;

[ul][li]You must Know HTML and CSS and Possibly PHP[/li]
[li]You must work well in a team[/li]
[li]Be open to constructive critisism[/li]
[li]You must agree to the Terms and Conditions at the bottom of the job descriptions[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Terms & Conditions

Loyalty; You agree that you will not tell anyone other than Bumper ltd. Team members of yours plans for the server or tell anyone other Bumper Ltd. Team about any of the other un-released content.

Personal Information; You will not share any personal information of the Bumper Ltd. team or its members with anyone. All information must be kept personal.

[hr]

[center][b]Application Form[/b] Name: Applying for: Email: Age: Experience: Proof of experience: (link) Do you agree to Terms & Conditions?: Yes/No[/center]

Read full topic
